render_outside_of_fate.label: Render outside of fate
render_outside_of_fate.tooltip: Show available debug types even when not in a fate.

render_distance_to_engaged_enemies.label: Render range indicator for engaged enemies
render_distance_to_engaged_enemies.tooltip: Render a range indicator from the player to the furthest engaged enemies hitbox.

render_distance_to_engaged_enemies_color.label: Color
render_distance_to_engaged_enemies_color.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with

render_distance_to_not_engaged_enemies.label: Render range indicator for non-engaged enemies
render_distance_to_not_engaged_enemies.tooltip: Render a range indicator from the player to the furthest non-engaged enemies hitbox.

render_distance_to_not_engaged_enemies_c.label: Color
render_distance_to_not_engaged_enemies_c.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with

render_aoe_radius_around_player.label: Render aoe indicator around player
render_aoe_radius_around_player.tooltip: Render a 5 yalm range indicator around the player.

render_aoe_radius_around_player_color.label: Color
render_aoe_radius_around_player_color.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with

render_line_to_engaged_enemies_out_of_ao.label: Render line to engaged enemies that are out of range
render_line_to_engaged_enemies_out_of_ao.tooltip: Render a line to engaged enemies who's hitboxes are further than 5 yalms.

render_line_to_engaged_enemies_out_of_ao.label: Color
render_line_to_engaged_enemies_out_of_ao.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with

render_line_to_non_engaged_enemies.label: render line to non-engaged enemies
render_line_to_non_engaged_enemies.tooltip: Render a line to non-engaged enemies.

render_line_to_non_engaged_enemies_color.label: Color
render_line_to_non_engaged_enemies_color.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with

render_mob_hitbox_radius.label: Render mob hitbox radius
render_mob_hitbox_radius.tooltip: Render the hitbox radius of a mob, even when it's not targeted.

render_engaged_mob_hitbox_radius_color.label: Engaged Color
render_engaged_mob_hitbox_radius_color.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with

render_not_engaged_mob_hitbox_radius_col.label: Not Engaged Color
render_not_engaged_mob_hitbox_radius_col.tooltip: The color to render this debug feature with
